home.headline: Detect
home.subtitle: Upload an image or video and let our multi-signal engine analyze it for signs of AI generation — all within your browser.
home.disclaimer: Results are heuristic-based indicators, not definitive proof.
home.errorUnsupported: Unsupported format. Use JPEG, PNG, WebP, GIF, MP4, or WebM.
home.errorFailed: Analysis failed. Try a different file.
home.summaryAi: This content is likely AI-generated. Multiple anomalies detected in image structure.
home.summaryReal: This content appears authentic. Analysis indicators are consistent with natural photography.
home.summaryUncertain: Unable to determine clearly. Content requires further examination with additional tools.
home.explainHigh: High score indicates many AI-typical features — unusually smooth edges, repeating patterns, lack of natural noise.
home.explainMid: Medium score — the image has some AI-like features but not enough for a clear conclusion. Further verification recommended.
home.explainLow: Low score indicates natural characteristics — sensor noise, edge variation, and metadata consistent with real photography.
product.headline: Verify media
product.subtitle: An open-source detection engine that analyzes images and videos for signs of AI generation — entirely in your browser.
product.card1.title: Multi-signal engine
product.card1.desc: 6+ detection algorithms running in parallel — frequency analysis, noise patterns, edge detection, metadata inspection and more.
product.card2.title: Privacy by design
product.card2.desc: Every computation happens on your device. No uploads, no servers, no tracking — your files never leave your browser.
product.card3.title: Real-time results
product.card3.desc: Analysis completes in milliseconds. No queues, no waiting, no accounts required.
features.headline: Everything you need to
features.subtitle: A comprehensive toolkit for verifying media authenticity — built for transparency and trust.
features.item1.title: Multi-signal Analysis
features.item1.desc: 6+ detection algorithms analyze frequency, noise, edge patterns and more simultaneously for comprehensive coverage.
features.item2.title: 100% Private
features.item2.desc: All processing runs locally in your browser. Zero data is ever uploaded to any server.
features.item3.title: Instant Results
features.item3.desc: Get detailed analysis results in milliseconds — no waiting for server-side processing.
features.item4.title: High Accuracy
features.item4.desc: Advanced heuristic-based detection with confidence scoring across multiple dimensions.
features.item5.title: Images & Video
features.item5.desc: Full support for JPEG, PNG, WebP, GIF, AVIF, MP4, WebM — all popular image and video formats.
features.item6.title: Detailed Reports
features.item6.desc: Visual breakdown of every detection signal with score analysis and file info extraction.
howItWorks.headline: Three simple
howItWorks.subtitle: From upload to verdict in seconds — no setup, no account, no data collection.
howItWorks.step1.title: Upload your file
howItWorks.step1.desc: Drag and drop or click to upload any image or video. We support JPEG, PNG, WebP, GIF, MP4, WebM and more — up to 100MB.
howItWorks.step2.title: Multi-signal analysis
howItWorks.step2.desc: Our engine runs 6+ detection algorithms in parallel — analyzing frequency patterns, noise signatures, edge artifacts and metadata — all locally in your browser.
howItWorks.step3.title: Get your results
howItWorks.step3.desc: View a detailed breakdown with an overall confidence score, individual signal analysis, and clear verdict on whether the content appears AI-generated.
about.headline: Building
about.p1: As AI-generated content becomes increasingly indistinguishable from real media, the need for reliable detection tools has never been greater.
about.p2suffix: detection engine that empowers anyone to verify content authenticity.
about.p3: Every analysis runs entirely in your browser — no uploads, no tracking, no compromise.
about.stat1.label: Open source
about.stat2.label: Data collected
about.stat3.label: Detection signals
signal.metadata.aiDetected: AI generation software detected in file metadata
signal.metadata.cameraDetected: Real camera signature detected in metadata
signal.metadata.namingPattern: File naming pattern suggests AI generation
signal.metadata.aiResolution: Resolution matches common AI output dimensions
signal.noise.ai: Noise pattern is unusually uniform — common in AI-generated images
signal.noise.real: Noise varies naturally across the image — consistent with real photography
signal.edge.ai: Edge patterns are unusually smooth — may indicate AI generation
signal.edge.real: Edge patterns show natural variation — consistent with real content
signal.color.ai: Color distribution shows patterns common in AI-generated imagery
signal.frequency.ai: Low high-frequency content detected — characteristic of AI generation
signal.frequency.real: Frequency spectrum consistent with real camera capture
signal.texture.ai: Texture detail is unusually consistent across regions — may indicate AI
signal.texture.real: Texture detail varies naturally across the image
signal.compression.largePng: Large PNG file — common in AI tool output
signal.compression.heavyJpeg: Heavily compressed JPEG — may be re-saved AI content
signal.compression.webp: WebP format — common in both AI and web content
signal.symmetry.ai: Unusually high symmetry detected — potentially AI-generated
signal.symmetry.real: Natural asymmetry — consistent with real content
signal.video.short: Very short video — common in AI video generation
signal.video.long: Long video — less likely to be fully AI-generated
